00043 class KVIRC_API KviFileTransferManager : public QObject
00044 {
00045         friend class KviApp;
00046         friend class KviFileTransfer;
00047         friend class KviFileTransferWindow;
00048         Q_OBJECT
00049 public:
00050         KviFileTransferManager();
00051         ~KviFileTransferManager();
00052 protected:
00053         KviPointerList<KviFileTransfer> * m_pTransferList;
00054         KviWindow                   * m_pTransferWindow;
00055 protected:
00056         static void cleanup();
00057         void registerTransfer(KviFileTransfer * t);
00058         void unregisterTransfer(KviFileTransfer * t);
00059         void setTransferWindow(KviWindow * wnd){ m_pTransferWindow = wnd; };
00060 public:
00061         // might be zero!
00062         KviWindow * transferWindow(){ return m_pTransferWindow; };
00063         static KviFileTransferManager * instance();
00064         KviPointerList<KviFileTransfer> * transferList(){ return m_pTransferList; };
00065         void invokeTransferWindow(KviWindow * pWnd = 0,bool bCreateMinimized = false,bool bNoRaise = false);
00066         void killAllTransfers();
00067         void killTerminatedTransfers();
00068 signals:
00069         void transferRegistered(KviFileTransfer *t);
00070         void transferUnregistering(KviFileTransfer *t);
00071 };

00073 #define COLUMN_TRANSFERTYPE 0
00074 #define COLUMN_FILEINFO 1
00075 #define COLUMN_PROGRESS 2
00076 
00077 class KVIRC_API KviFileTransfer : public QObject
00078 {
00079         Q_OBJECT
00080 public:
00081         KviFileTransfer();
00082         ~KviFileTransfer();
00083 protected:
00084         int              m_iId;
00085         KviTalTableWidgetItemEx  * m_pDisplayItem;
00086 public:
00087         // This is called by KviFileTransferItem at any time
00088         void setDisplayItem(KviTalTableWidgetItemEx * i){ m_pDisplayItem = i; };
00089         int id(){ return m_iId; };
00090         // this is just a convenience function : it's equivalent to !active()
00091         bool terminated();
00092         // This may be used to invoke the transfer window
00093         void invokeTransferWindow(KviWindow * pWnd = 0,bool bCreateMinimized = false,bool bNoRaise = false);
00094         KviFileTransferManager * manager(){ return KviFileTransferManager::instance(); };
00095         // this returns the pointer to the transfer window : may be 0!
00096         KviWindow * transferWindow(){ return manager()->transferWindow(); };
00097         // this returns transferWindow() if not 0 , otherwise the application's active window
00098         KviWindow * outputWindow();
00099 
00100         // this may be called by the transfers to update the display when the state changes
00101         void displayUpdate();
00102 
00103         // this must be implemented by the transfer
00104         virtual bool active() = 0;
00105         virtual void displayPaint(QPainter * p,int column, QRect rect) = 0;
00106         virtual QString tipText();
00107         virtual QString localFileName();
00108         virtual QString retryCommand();
00109         virtual int displayHeight(int iLineSpacing);
00110         virtual void fillContextPopup(KviTalPopupMenu * m) = 0;
00111         virtual void die();
00112 };
